Based on the provided preferences cues, one potential recommendation could be the film "Prometheus" (2012) directed by Ridley Scott. 

The movie "Prometheus" is based on the ancient Greek myth of Prometheus, who stole fire from the gods and gave it to humanity.

The movie follows the story of a group of humans who have returned to Earth after many years away. One of the members of this group is a woman named Eve, who has been given the gift of knowledge by the gods.

One day, Eve meets a man named Adam, who she falls in love with. 

After they have been together for some time, Eve tells Adam that she knows about her own origins and that she has learned about the rest of humanity from other sources. 

Adam listens to what Eve has to say, and he then tells Eve that he is also sorry for not being able to figure out his own origins.
